name: Digital Impulse
tagline: Boston Web Design and Digital Marketing Agency
description: Digital Impulse is a Boston-based digital marketing & web design agency focused on helping clients grow their business by implementing and managing intelligent online marketing programs. We take pride in helping our clients strategize, design, implement and manage digital marketing campaigns/websites, that focus on generating sales, leads, and actions. We are committed to excellent service, tangible results and long-term relationships.
